headline: Seagate Completes Acquisition of Intevac
summary: FREMONT, Calif., March 31, 2025--Seagate Technology Holdings plc (Nasdaq: STX) ("Seagate"), a leading innovator of mass-capacity data storage, announced today that it has completed the acquisition of Intevac, Inc. (Nasdaq: IVAC) ("Intevac"), a supplier of thin-film processing systems.

raw.headline: Seagate Completes Acquisition of Intevac
raw.summary: FREMONT, Calif., March 31, 2025--Seagate Technology Holdings plc (Nasdaq: STX) ("Seagate"), a leading innovator of mass-capacity data storage, announced today that it has completed the acquisition of Intevac, Inc. (Nasdaq: IVAC) ("Intevac"), a supplier of thin-film processing systems.

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell STX and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Shareholders of Seagate Technology would probably like to forget the past six months even happened. The stock dropped 23.3% and now trades at $84. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
